channel.title: Making a new private server coding from SCRATCH!
channel.description:
Hi, I'm going to make a new Private Server for RS2, In a new way of JAVA scripting, Something like RuneScript, but a little more advanced if i can
The target is: ~Making a new kind of JAVA scripting ~Making a private server much better than real rs. ~Linkable to other servers ~Linkable to IRC servers ~Compile and reboot instantly after update ~No more lag ~Better view on your character ~Improved graphics ~New magic system ~-_Open for Suggestions_-~
If you want to participate u need: ~Good JAVA knowledge ~Good idea's ~Be able to work on it at least 1 hour each day. ~Able to work on your own ~Be fast in thinking, ~Good at solving errors
If you wanna participate post:
How good you are at java (rate yourself 1/10) Why u want to participate, And if you're able to work hard.
Thanks in advance I hope this project will grow alot, and many people will participate
~System79
P.S Many people will think im nearly new here, i've been in the world of rs2 private servers since runestatus was there,
P.P.S Hope you will enjoy !! :)

@cooper wrote:

you dont need rep to code… i have 0 rep (because i keep my stuff private) and i can code very well
edit
darnit someone repped me i have 1 now
lol jk rep is nice but not needed

looking at this now jagex has already done that in there game… have you seen the upgrades they are awhile back. idk how far back but they have used these ideas in there game already. idk about the new magic system though. are you trying to improve on what they already have? im not trying to be a pain in the but about this. im new ^^

item.title: Making a new private server coding from SCRATCH!
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

Hi,
I’m going to make a new Private Server for RS2,
In a new way of JAVA scripting,
Something like RuneScript, but a little more advanced if i can

The target is:
~Making a new kind of JAVA scripting
~Making a private server much better than real rs.
~Linkable to other servers
~Linkable to IRC servers
~Compile and reboot instantly after update
~No more lag
~Better view on your character
~Improved graphics
~New magic system
~-Open for Suggestions-~

If you want to participate u need:
~Good JAVA knowledge
~Good idea’s
~Be able to work on it at least 1 hour each day.
~Able to work on your own
~Be fast in thinking,
~Good at solving errors

If you wanna participate post:

How good you are at java (rate yourself 1/10)
Why u want to participate,
And if you’re able to work hard.

Thanks in advance
I hope this project will grow alot, and many people will participate

~System79

P.S Many people will think im nearly new here, i’ve been in the world of rs2 private servers since runestatus was there,

P.P.S Hope you will enjoy !!
